fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give a player motivation to achieve you. If that player was good, they gain a one-use rampage kill, which they may use on any player who owns the Key. (minimum basic attack value) If they were evil, their faction is changed to Town, and can only change back by obtaining the Key. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The first person to kill an evil role of any kind 'equips' you. When you equip this:
 - You gain +1 to both your attack and defense stats. If you have a negative attack value, nothing happens. If you have no attacking abilities, you gain a one-use kill.
 - You cannot be voted out of the game.
 - Other players, instead of their night action, can attempt to steal the Key. One random player will succeed at this.
 - After losing the Key, you will commit suicide in 3 phases (so if you lose it N1, you die D3). This can only be cured by Therapist (254).
